Text: Jihofa te̩ko-o, todu e̩ne̩ ki akpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ de̩ ge̩ n;
E̩ne̩ du efu ma nʼo̩la o̩wai aka kpʼekeji-wñ;
Jihofa akʼuko du ki aka o̩ligo̩ligo̩ da rinyo̩,
kʼama kakini, Awa anʼukpalu-wa fʼuma du,
Todabu ku ma fʼame̩no̩bata kpo̩fo̩, tod ifi kʼame̩nale jʼafi,
E̩gba ku ma hi e̩wñtuñ ne ef amo̩ma amone̩,
